Risk.ConditionText: Thermal control on the lunar surface is technically challenging, particularly with the limited volume and power resources allowed on CLPS lander vehicles. Biological payloads require tight thermal control tolerances.
Risk.IfText: If the Project is unable to design a sufficiently robust thermal control system within the CLPS vehicle parameters
Risk.ThenText: Then the experiment may not be controlled to scientifically-sound standards, or fail altogether
Risk.RiskDrivers: Payload hardware and resource limitations imposed by CLPS program

MitigationStep.Description: LEIA thermal design is in early concept stages. Additional thermal SMEs can be brought in from Code RE if noticeable progress is not made by early May.

Risk.ConditionText: The process to submit a PI solicitation, undergo review, receive and assess responses, and select a PI takes ~10 months. Currently, a PI selection is expected ~Feb 2022.
Risk.IfText: If the PI selection (and thus experiment defintion) occurs after PRISM-2 proposal deadline
Risk.ThenText: Then LEIA will not have sufficient information to put forth a competitive PRISM proposal, putting the selection for flight at risk
Risk.RiskDrivers: Space Biology (HQ) submittal of PI solicitation and review timeline required by NRESS

MitigationStep.Description: Space Biology (HQ) is responsible for submitting PI solicitation. They are working to see if the overall solicitation timeline can be accelerated.

Risk.ConditionText: Current restrictions to acquiring approval to come onsite and then limitations on the work that can be performed is slowing down the project
Risk.IfText: If restrictions continue at current level past early summer (project assumption for relaxation of restrictions)
Risk.ThenText: Then the project schedule will incur additional slip
Risk.RiskDrivers: Ames Research Center onsite access/work restrictions, tied to current status of local COVID-19 pandemic state

MitigationStep.Description: Ames Research Center remains at Stage 3, no immediate forecasted reduction in onsite access/work restrictions; summer TBD

Risk.ConditionText: LEIA must define a CM system for the project that satisfies SCF requirements. The project budget and schedule was estimated with the assumption of utilizing efficient, effective tools in use within various engineering organizations at Ames
Risk.IfText: If LEIA is required to use the SCF EDITS system and processes for documents/procedures (ERC) and bonded storage (MCS)
Risk.ThenText: Then there will be an impact to project cost and schedule due to the substantial overhead that these processes require of project team members
Risk.RiskDrivers: Engineering organization (SCF) authority required use of certain CM systems

MitigationStep.Description: Discussions/negotiations in progress between Project and SCF on required CM processes
